SEARCH
Package co.edu.unbosque.electroshop_api.service

Class OrderService

java.lang.Object
co.edu.unbosque.electroshop_api.service.OrderService
@Service public class OrderService extends Object
Service class for managing orders and their related operations.

This service class provides methods for processing orders, creating processed order DTOs, and retrieving all processed orders. It interacts with the repositories to perform CRUD operations and uses DataMapper for converting between entities and DTOs.

  • Method Details

    • processOrder

      public ProcessedOrderDTO processOrder(InitialOrderDTO orderDTO, float totalPrice, boolean payment, List<Product> products)
      Processes an order based on the provided InitialOrderDTO and payment status.

      This method converts the provided InitialOrderDTO into an Order entity, updates the status of the order based on the payment status, and saves it to the OrderRepository. It also creates OrderProduct entities for each product in the order and saves them to the OrderProductRepository.

      Parameters:
      orderDTO - the data transfer object containing the initial order details
      totalPrice - the total price of the order
      payment - boolean indicating whether the payment was successful
      products - complete list of products
      Returns:
      a ProcessedOrderDTO containing the processed order details

    • createProcessedOrder

      public ProcessedOrderDTO createProcessedOrder(Order order, Map<Integer,Integer> products)
      Creates a ProcessedOrderDTO from an Order and product details.

      This method initializes a ProcessedOrderDTO with details from the provided Order and the associated customer and product information.

      Parameters:
      order - the Order entity containing order details
      products - a map of product IDs to quantities for the order
      Returns:
      a ProcessedOrderDTO containing the processed order details

    • getAllOrders

      public List<ProcessedOrderDTO> getAllOrders()
      Retrieves all processed orders from the database.

      This method fetches all Order entities from the database, converts them into ProcessedOrderDTO objects, and returns a list of these DTOs.

      Returns:
      a list of ProcessedOrderDTO objects representing all processed orders
